about xo hotels city centrexo hotels city centre is a 3-star hotel in the middle of the city center (what else can you expect with this name?) inside, the hotel looks different around every corner, because it consists of 11 monumental buildings. all connected of course, so you don’t have to go outside to find your room.
xo hotels city centre is located in the historical center of amsterdam; behind the amsterdam stock exchange, in walking distance of the amsterdam central station, and just around the corner of the dam square and the red light district. you can take a canal cruise, feed the pigeons at the dam square, shop at one of the many shopping streets and have dinner and a drink at night. all without scuffing your shoes too much. that’s city centre life!

about xo hotels park westa big pink elephant, or a hotel? both! the delightful 4-star hotel xo hotels park west is located in a former office building, nicknamed the pink elephant, since 2012.
inside, there is nothing left of the old office colossus, with high-quality renovated rooms, a large breakfast room and a reception where you can check-in and out yourself. of course a receptionist is available 24 hours a day to help you with check-in, with any questions about the hotel or with tips for the city of amsterdam.
xo hotels park west is located in amsterdam-west, next to the a10 motorway, within walking distance of sloterdijk station and on the edge of the westerpark. the tram stops right outside and takes you to the center within 20 minutes, or hop on your bike and speed through the westerpark in 15 minutes to the anne frank house.
